name: Monte Carlo Slots - All New, Rich Vegas Casino of the Grand Jackpot Monaco Bonanza!
name_original: Monte Carlo Slots - All New, Rich Vegas Casino of the Grand Jackpot Monaco Bonanza!
description:
---- Download the BEST CASINO game FOR FREE! ----

Monte Carlo Slots gives you the chance to WIN BIG and enjoy the most authentic online casino experience right on your device!

Make a fortune with HUGE Payouts, Free Daily Coins, Bonus Games, and more! Get ready to play Slots featuring HD art and animations only seen before on real slot machines in the best casinos!

Vegas Party
Step into the hottest bash on the Las Vegas Strip!

Pirate Island
Explore the wreckage of the infamous Pirate Raid on Cartagena and find the Treasure!

Ancient Rome
Enjoy the spoils or the Ancient Rome and win lots of gold!

Frozen Kingdom
Explore the kingdom of Sabertooth Tigers and Ice-breathing Blue Dragons!

Jungle Run
The King of the Jungle waits for you!

Tales of Egypt
Enter the Tomb at your own risk!

Golden Throne
WIN BIG with the elegant King and Queen of the Medieval Golden era!

Outer Space!
Area 51 has some top-secret creatures on the loose, and they want to go Home!

Cleopatra's Gold
The forsaken Pyramid across the desert holds a Golden Secret!

Wild West
It's 1850 and bullets are flying! WIN BIG in the crazy Wild West!

Mayan Riches
Enter the lost temple of Lady Itzan at your own risk!

Circus Deluxe
Trapezists, Lion Tamers and Bearded Ladies can play FREE of Charge!

TOP FEATURES:

- Huge variety of top-quality slot machines (with more being released all the time!)
- Exciting “Spin The Wheel” Bonus Game!
- Free bonus coins every day – Collect higher coin amounts as you increase your player level!
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!
- No internet connection required to play!
- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!

For help and support please contact us at: support@thickcutapps.com
